title: Set alias for columns in data set, but the expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset.
description: In the expression builder, when selecting a dataset, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases that have been set.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases that have been set.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset. 
2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
